section.title: Recommended JVM settings for the Java WS Core container
section.para: It is recommended to increase the maximum heap size of the JVM when running the container. By default on Sun JVMs a 64MB maximum heap size is used. The maximum heap size can be set using the -Xmx JVM option. Example:
The above example will make the container start with maximum heap size set to 512MB.

It is also recommended to experiment with other JVM settings to improve performance. For example, the -server option on Sun JVMs enables a server VM which can deliver better performance for server applications.
